identity.aesthetic: Dark Mode, High Contrast, Neon Accents, Grid-based
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Terminal aesthetics with Modern SaaS.
Emotion First: Evoke trust and technical mastery.
Content is King: Data density and clarity are paramount.
Zoom In: Focus on transaction details and key management.
Negative Space: Use spacing to group logic units.
Contrast: High contrast for readability in dark mode.

typography.instructions: Import 'JetBrains Mono' and 'Manrope' from Google Fonts. Use JetBrains Mono for all Headings (h1-h4), Data Values, and Code snippets. Use Manrope for Body text, UI labels, and Descriptions.

structure.sidebar: Fixed width (240px) on desktop, collapsible. Dark surface (#121212) with border-r.

cards.style: Flat, sharp or rounded-md (border-radius: 6px). 1px border (#27272a). No heavy shadows, use 'glow' on hover.

buttons.primary: rounded-md font-mono text-sm uppercase tracking-wide px-6 py-2.5 shadow-[0_0_10px_rgba(20,241,149,0.2)]
buttons.outline: border border-[#27272a] bg-transparent hover:bg-[#27272a] text-white rounded-md

inputs.style: bg-[#09090b] border border-[#27272a] rounded-md focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#14F195] text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 font-mono

tables.style: Compact, dense. Header uppercase text-xs text-zinc-500. Row hover: bg-[#27272a]/50. Font-mono for addresses/hashes.

terminal.style: bg-[#050505] border border-[#27272a] rounded-md p-4 font-mono text-xs overflow-y-auto max-h-[300px]

visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React (default). Use specific tech/crypto icons from 'lucide-react' (e.g., Wallet, Activity, Shield, Code, Terminal).

transitions.page_load: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.4 }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #FAFAFA (Zinc 50) on dark backgrounds. Use #A1A1AA (Zinc 400) for secondary text. Avoid dark grey on black.

instructions: Use 'JetBrains Mono' for anything related to code, hash, address, or amounts.
Use 'Manrope' for UI labels and long descriptions.
Ensure all interactive elements have data-testid.
